title: Coffee Break Collection 22 -- Days Gone By
description: This is the twenty-second Coffee Break Collection, in which Librivox readers select English language public domain works of about 15 minutes or less in duration -- perfect to listen to during commutes, workouts or coffee breaks. The topic for this collection is Days Gone By. All pieces were of a historical nature at the time written (i.e. not enough that they are historical now!). Ancient Rome, Greece or Egypt, medieval Europe, the early days of the American colonies.

sections.title: The Birth Time of the Gods Chapter 1 of Old-World Japan: Legends of the Land of the Gods by Frank Rinder
The Sad Story of a Boy King by George Cary Eggleston
A Day at Strawberry Hill by Austin Dobson
The Earliest Egyptian Remains by Charles Francis Horne
The First Americans by Cotton Mather
The First Saxon Settlement by Walter Besant
The First Thanksgiving by Cotton Mather
The Foundation of Rome by John Frost
Intellectual Life by William B. Forwood
Marrying a God by Saxo Grammaticus
Old Salem Shops by Eleanor Putnam
The Poem in the Tomb of Antuf by Sir Ernest Alfred Thompson Wallis Budge
The Wandering Nations, (Chapter 2 of A Short History of Wales) by Owen M. Edwards
Chapter 1 - The Wild West from The Life of Abraham Lincoln by Henry Ketcham
